page.title: 20EATING AND DRINKING
page.content: At any lunch time the car parks of the{local pubs and restaurants}off of the main roads will be full.The owners of these establishments have made great efforts to attract custom through providing{high class food}and a variety of{real ales.} The pub at West Ashling is noted for its extensive selection of real ales (Richmond Arms) whilst the restaurant at Funtington has won high praise for its cuisine.(Hallidays) As there are few other forms of entertainment in the vicinity the "hostels" attract a number of{local {residents}as well as the{casual} {visitor.}
